Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory744.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "I'll take the left, and you'll take the right, No. 21. Shorty, stay close to us.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilin', 3: "I'm not short! I... I am not done growing yet!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 walks to the other side of the road with a blank face and focuses on some marks left on the undergrowth and mud.'}
{3: 'Her tail swings quickly but mindlessly, destroying a few fragile flowers.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Is Kurono the one responsible for developing No. 21's new frame now?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Under who's order?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "We'd need a lot of help from Kurono even if we wanted to design it ourselves. We have no data on her current design.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'This frame might just become the victim of some complicated war one day.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's better to let one party complete the entire design, rather than have both sides be skeptical about the other's design.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'For developers, getting the new frame to work is the only way to obtain new, valid data.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'So I can understand why he decided to hand over the authority of design.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'But I can promise you that I hold significant influence even if I can only supervise the process.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I would like to receive a copy of every progress and compatibility report. This is a reasonable request from the supervisor of No. 21, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'll see to it as long as classified development information is kept safe.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'On behalf of No. 21, I really appreciate your help.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The red-haired Construct puts on a bright smile, but under her perfect smile stirs raging, suppressed anger.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I'll get going, then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '...One second. I know No. 21 has little common sense and has trouble with words, but do you know anything about what she wrote about her wish for the new frame?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What did she write?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '"To have the smell of humans."', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory744.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ever since she returned from a mission in a little town, "the smell of humans" became one of her favorite phrases.'}
{3: 'Vera never paid much attention to it when it appeared in the daily squabbles of Cerberus.'}
{3: '"The smell of humans"? That is something that becomes non-existent the moment someone chooses to become a Construct.'}
{3: 'Noctis is no brighter, and Vera would give him a painful kick the moment she heard him say something like that.'}
{3: 'But for someone who was robbed of her human experience, crazy phrases like this seem oddly fitting.'}
{3: 'But nobody knows what No. 21 still needs to become the "human" she imagined.'}
{3: 'The original goal was to provide her with some extra options on top of stability.'}
{3: "But live testing has shown that the frame cannot follow her wishes if it's to maintain stability."}
{3: 'And as far as frame stability goes, most Constructs experience fear and panic when the imagined self is different from their actual self.'}
{3: "Basically, it's when their inner self cannot accept reality."}
{3: 'Does No. 21 really know her heart? She is showing a lower compatibility in the human-like frame than her current frame.'}
{3: 'No. 21, can you find what you are desperately looking for?'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Is Buddy going to die?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'If you were the one who is lost, are you going to sit there and wait for death?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "No, I'll come back to be with you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Then you should know more than anyone else that Buddy isn't going to give up so easily.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having some motivation recovered, No. 21 rushes back to her research area.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilin', 3: 'I found some footprints! Over there!!', 4: '1'}
{3: "The boy's yell emanates from nearby as he waves at Vera with an exaggerated gesture. Without waiting for her response, he swiftly dashes toward the newly discovered clue."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Hey! Don't run away like that!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Ugh... No. 21, follow him!', 4: '1'}
